website_summaries.verdict: Available in a variety of gentle scents, Sam's Natural Deodorant works naturally to leave you smelling fresh all day long.
pros: Free from harsh and harmful chemicals, Sam's is made with baking soda to neutralize odor causing bacteria, coconut oil to fight bacterial and fungal growth while moisturizing the skin, and arrowroot powder to absorb wetness
Keeps your armpits dry to an extent
Stick lasts for a good amount of time

customer_reviews.title: Product smelled good and was easy to apply however a severely painful ...
customer_reviews.text: Product smelled good and was easy to apply however a severely painful rash developed in both armpits within 36 hours of a light application. I had to apply topical aloe vera and lidocaine in addition to taking oral pain medication to get through the day. It must not be an uncommon problem since the concern for a reaction is printed on the label as well as with a piece of paper that shipped with the product.
customer_reviews.author: Newsan

customer_reviews.title: Da best...
customer_reviews.text: This is the first review I've ever left on Amazon. I normally don't, but felt compelled to because of this product. I've looked long and hard for a natural deodorant that doesn't have me reaching for another swipe, come lunch time, while I'm working. I couldn't handle my stench while using some various other products. This stuff is great. I'll be bulk ordering next time.
customer_reviews.author: Winston

customer_reviews.title: Sam's is definitely my favorite natural deodorant
customer_reviews.text: Yep, Sam's is definitely my favorite natural deodorant! I have tried Schmit's and Primal Pit Paste and neither compare to Sam's. You don't have to rub this stuff into your pits after applying like with Schmit's, and it doesn't feel sticky under your arms like Primal Pit Paste does. It keeps me smelling fresh all day long without a trace of body odor seeping through. Ravine is my favorite scent so far. It will sting if applied right after shaving, but what can you expect from a baking soda based deo? UPDATE: Im back to buy more. Just want to let you know that one stick with everyday use lasted me 3 months!
customer_reviews.author: Carrie

customer_reviews.title: Was good for a very short while.
customer_reviews.text: This stuff had me excited for a while. I got the unscented one and the first week and a half it was working great. I bike commute to work every day and I wasn't getting any hint of body odor while using this deodorant. Then I started getting some irritation, which caused me to use it much less. Then I did laundry and realized I was seeing light bleach-like stains under the arms of darker shirts which I found weird. Point is I had to go back to using degree. At least until my underarms are back to normal.
customer_reviews.author: Xavier S.Top Contributor: Cycling

customer_reviews.title: More Effective Than Regular Deodorant
customer_reviews.text: Old Spice has always been my go to deodorant (non-antiperspirant), but every once in a while I like to try something new. The reviews on Sam's Natural Deodorant were consistently good, so I figured it was worth trying. I was very skeptical of this product, but it won me over by the end of the first week. It goes on almost like regular deodorant and seems to actually be better at keeping the smell away.
customer_reviews.author: Justin H.

customer_reviews.title: If you’re skeptical but intrigued, it’s 100% worth trying.
customer_reviews.text: After using for approximately one week, I am happy with the performance of the deodorant. The scent is mild but stays almost an entire 10hr day at work. This seems like a good alternative to a chemical-based way to stay smelling decent. Obviously without the pore blockage or chemicals you will need to reapply but I am switching from my usual Gillette gel to this for good. I shoveled my driveway and sidewalks after a full workday and my wife was none the wiser so it works as it should. Stay healthy!
customer_reviews.author: Jordan Cline

customer_reviews.title: Works perfect. First off the smell is amazing ( I'm ...
customer_reviews.text: 2 months ago I decided to make the switch to Natural deodorant., and tried out 2 of the more popular brands, Native and Schmidt. Both worked well for the first couple of hours but as the work day wore on I found myself needing to reapply. This deodorant though! Works perfect. First off the smell is amazing ( I'm a woman but the tobacco scent is just sweet enough, so I smell nice but not too musky and manly) 14 hours after applying I could still detect the scent, and there's no sign of BO! I even find this works to keep me decently dry even without being an antiperspirant. 10/10 would recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Jessica Perras

customer_reviews.title: So far, so good!
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my husband who was having reactions to strong OTC deodorants with harsh chemicals. He sweats pretty easily but so far, he hasn't had a problem with odor while using this. The Sport fragrance is very much like a lemongrass scent...not what I was expecting but not bad either. It doesn't apply as smoothly as traditional deodorants so that takes some getting used to. Overall, I think this is a great natural deodorant that doesn't have toxic ingredients.
customer_reviews.author: EKR0225

customer_reviews.title: Ruined my black clothing
customer_reviews.text: I switched to natural deodorant several months ago because I got sick of ruining my shirts with antiperspirant stains. Since this product doesn't have aluminum, I thought I would be in the clear. Instead, it left horrible wax marks on several of my favorite black shirts. We're talking huge white rings appearing from under my arms by the end of the work day. I have tried the company's advice for product removal (three times!) but the stains will not budge. This wasn't due to over application; I used light swipes and rubbed the product into my skin before getting dressed. It smells great, but don't buy it if you plan on wearing dark colors and/or sweating!
customer_reviews.author: I shop here

customer_reviews.title: I do not have sensitive skin - This product caused an itchy painful rash with cysts
customer_reviews.text: STONGLY RECOMMENED YOU NOT USE THIS Product. As others stated in their reviews.. an I read before I purchased...(but did not worry about because I do not have sensitive skin)...This deodorant caused my armpits to breakout in a lumpy rash that was extremely itchy and even painful. There was nothing else to attribute the rash to except this product. I've discontinued use for almost 2 weeks now and still have sensitive lumps in my pits. I've not been to a doctor, but I do have an appointment next week and will have them look at the issue. THIS IS THE FIRST PRODUCT I've ever given a one star rating. There is something wrong with it!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Wilderness scent = dirt
customer_reviews.text: I was mixed on giving this a 1 start, but eventually had to because i wouldn't recommend it. Mainly because the wilderness scent is not how i think of the wilderness smelling. It smells like fresh dirt, so it is kind of like the wilderness smell - but not what i would want my date, co-workers, or anyone else to smell on me.
customer_reviews.author: Anonymous

customer_reviews.title: Light application is the key
customer_reviews.text: This stuff works but needs to be reapplied at the end of the day of I don't want to be really smelly in the morning. Only a light application is needed as stated in the directions. The baking soda causes mild itching if even slightly over applied. If you have to scrub it off in the shower you are really overdoing it. Best of all it lasts a long time if used right. No problems with stained shirts yet but we will see...
customer_reviews.author: M. Silva

customer_reviews.title: Great deodorant and long lasting
customer_reviews.text: I waited until I used the whole container before writing this because others posted about skin sensitivity. I never had skin sensitivity with this. The smell lasts amazingly all day. The leather truly smells like leather but I won’t get it again. Just a little too strong and conflicts with cologne. However, that’s not a reason to give them less than 5 stars because, well, it’s what was advertised. I just ordered a couple more (sport and tobacco). I’ll keep using until I find the scent that I like most. This is my new favorite deodorant brand.
customer_reviews.author: NoChicagono

customer_reviews.title: I have non sensitive skin and no allergies
customer_reviews.text: It was fine for a few days and then a week in the pic above happened. I don't have sensitive skin and I'm not allergic to anything. Wish i knew why this reaction happened.
customer_reviews.author: Kristen Murphy

customer_reviews.title: It works
customer_reviews.text: Wore it through a 12 hour shift in a hot warehouse in the desert heat and smelled just fine. I was a dehydrated mummy by the end of the day but all my coworkers said I was the best smelling shriveled corpse on the crew!
customer_reviews.author: Anna Grim

customer_reviews.title: Pricey But It does the Job-I'll still Recommend!
customer_reviews.text: I have been using other products before but THIS is a discovery I MUST say one has to try...OMG! It really works. One application, and that subtle wonderful smell works its wonders. words can't describe how happy I am that found this Product. I work out a lot, I am a runner. I work in my garden so I stay out in the sun more often than you can imagine. I forgot when I bought it but I still have a long way to go with this first one. Pricey? yes, BUT.. you only need one application so one will last you a loooooong time and you'll love being around people and vice versa ..LOL!
customer_reviews.author: Barry Krevoy

customer_reviews.title: I also love camping, being outdoors and working out
customer_reviews.text: I work 12 hour days, sometimes 16. I am in law enforcement and wear a lot of gear. In Florida. It gets hot. I also love camping, being outdoors and working out. So, I sweat an appropriate amount... This works GREAT! I tried Tom's and that was garbage and made everything worse. This lasts all day (it's weak after 16 hours as expected) and I never have problems with odor or discomfort. Tobacco scent is nice and kind of cologne-y in a good way. Not an Axe body spray way. 0 disappointments! Highly recommended. 1 stick lasted me over 2 months with regular use.
customer_reviews.author: Kari

customer_reviews.title: Smell is Wonderful and It really works!
customer_reviews.text: I am a Patchouli lover and have tried several deodorants over the years but none of them work. The smell is wonderful at first and then is taken over by body odor. I decided to try Sam's but wasn't expecting much but I was very pleasantly surprised. The smell is true patchouli and it lasts and I stay dry all day. I also like the round shape vs. the usual oval. I am sold!
customer_reviews.author: Sue

customer_reviews.title: Not for me, but smells amazing!
customer_reviews.text: Unfortunately I’m one of the, “Skin broke out when using,” bunch. From a little reading I’m fairly certain it’s a reaction to the sodium bicarbonate. That being said, I WISH I could wear this product. It smells so good. I’m giving it 5 stars because: - Product worked as advertised; - Above average smell; - Great presentation; and, - Great customer appreciation (generous return policy); Hey, I knew I was taking a gamble with the product from the get go - instructions are clear and easy to understand - so no hard feelings we didn’t work out. I was really looking forward to trying the other scents; so if a non-sodium bicarbonate product comes out I wanna know!
customer_reviews.author: James Bush

customer_reviews.title: Do not use if you have sensitive skin
customer_reviews.text: It broke me out after the 3rd day of continued use . The deodorant smells great but if you have sensitive skin do not use. I gave the deodorant to my friend she fell in love with it and no reaction to her skin . She said it lasted all day
customer_reviews.author: marissa

customer_reviews.title: Great product. Great company.
customer_reviews.text: I love this deodorant. I’ve been using it for years. I have sensitive skin (but not a sensitive guy) and this stuff works great for me. I work outdoors and spend most of my off time camping and doing outdoor type activities. The scents are very earthy and natural and last all day. I would highly recommend this product to anyone with sensitive skin or those who are conscious of what they put on/in their body. I have tried several of Sam’s Natural products and they are all top notch. Great company, great products.
customer_reviews.author: gcooper

customer_reviews.title: Tried many natural deodorants, this one is best so far
customer_reviews.text: I've been using the Sandalwood for a few weeks now. It works extremely well for me. No order whatsoever even after long summer walks in the hot sun. There are 2 issues I've had with other natural deodorants: 1. They simply do not work. 2. Are made from very heavy waxes or other ingredients that stain clothing. So far this one works well and I've found no evidence of damage to my shirts. Note this is not an anti-perspirant. It keeps the odor away but does not stop you from sweating.
customer_reviews.author: Just4M0

customer_reviews.title: Nope. Never again.
customer_reviews.text: It smells like lemon & lavender which together smell like body odor defeating it's purpose. I tried it to see if it would change a little on me & nope. Besides that weird smell, it is gritty, doesn't last AND it made my skin peel like I was sunburned. My BF even said whatever the lemon is that I'm wearing is not good. So if you try it, smell it & if it isn't what you like, return right away. It's too expensive to think it'll change for the better. I do not recommend even a first purchase, tho. Next!
customer_reviews.author: Wendy

customer_reviews.title: Great Natural Deodorant that MAY IRRITATE
customer_reviews.text: Very good natural deodorant, smell does last a while and keeps arm pits dry. The great “Vetiver” scent is strong as it is noticeable in smelling. Smells more of a style as more formal/suit/unique occasional vibe. Good size and round angle deo shape for usage. The “Bay” Sam’s Natural Deodorant wasn’t that good in overall compared to the other I’ve ordered from them the Vetiver deodorant. Maybe it’s cause I put a little too much in one of the hot days but before that it had made my arm pit get darker and guessing burned the skin/irritated it?? Plus, the scent in the Bay smells more like if it’s the Christmas season, not for my taste/smell should I say. 😂
customer_reviews.author: Israel M.

customer_reviews.title: I really, really, REALLY wanted it to work out
customer_reviews.text: I gotta be honest here. I like the idea and the premise behind the product. Does it keep you dry: yes. I used the 2 swipe recommendation and was very surprised that at how well such a small amount kept me dry. And it smelled great. Very earthy and mildly fragrant. However, I tried for almost 8 weeks to use this product, and my underarms were consistently breaking out. I would go sometimes 5 days without wearing deodorant to try to let my pits “cleanse” themselves of whatever was reacting to the deodorant. In the end, it just didn’t work for me.
customer_reviews.author: Luke Turner

customer_reviews.title: Chemical Burns
customer_reviews.text: My husband and I both tried this deodorant. I have very sensitive skin and wasn't horribly surprised when I had what looked like chemical burns on my armpits. My husband started using it and he has never had any adverse reaction to deodorant and he also got the same chemical burns. I would not recommend this to anyone for that reason. It did smell very nice, though.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: A rich, effective, all-natural deodorant with genuine character
customer_reviews.text: This is a fantastic natural deodorant. I originally ordered the Tobacco scented stick and was so impressed that I immediately ordered Patchouli and Oak Moss to put into my rotation. Most "all-natural" deodorants are too cakey and faint for my taste. Sam's is strong (though not overbearing), rich, slightly spicy, and very clean. The Oak Moss is very bright and green while the Patchouli smells like an earthy forest floor (not everyone digs that); the Tobacco smells masculine, spicy, and slightly roasting chestnut Christmasy. If any of that is up your alley, you'll probably dig this stuff.
customer_reviews.author: Sajun

customer_reviews.title: Highly Effective And Smells Great!
customer_reviews.text: Very effective product. My main concern was function. I was worried the ingredients in traditional deodorants were necessary for smooth application and overall effectiveness. I am pleased to know that is not true. This product (seems to be largely sodium bicarbonate and coconut oil) makes me wonder why anyone would buy traditional deodorants at all. I find myself only needing a single swipe for all day coverage. I will certainly buy if I ever make it through this entire stick. I like the smell of original. It is a mild, menthol scent.
customer_reviews.author: Nathan

customer_reviews.title: Works well
customer_reviews.text: I have been using for about a week, and I love it! It has a great smell, and it works great. I tried another natural deodorant, and I had an awful experience. It did not help and actually made me smell and sweat more, so I am so happy that Sam's deoderant has worked well!! The only thing I have had an issue with is that a bit after i put it on, it gets a weird smell, but it isnt from me sweating or anything and it goes away after maybe an hour. After that, it is totally fine. It is very strange. Because of this, I couldn't give it five stars.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Do Not BUY Sam's Patchouli!!!!
customer_reviews.text: Worst product ever!!! NO SMELL at all!!! I knew as soon as I opened it , it was going to suck!!! I have used Ancient Bath Patchouli, And Bodhi Basics, both knock you over as soon as you open them!!! If anyone has any Patchouli recommendation of products that don't suck email me, davidgonano@yahoo.com ..... I wasn't all that impressed with the other two products listed either, but they had a smell the first few weeks.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: It works well and I'll buy more.
customer_reviews.text: Smells great, container is great, consistency is thick (a little goes a long way) however, if you sweat profusely, you may have to reapply after 8 hours. ...or just take another shower and reapply. Oh and if you're pretty hairy in the pits, expect to have a fun time trying to scrubb the product off. It does build up. So I would say, three swipes and you're good to go. Any more and you've just made a dinner date with your pits bubba.
customer_reviews.author: Nick

customer_reviews.title: Irritated arm pits
customer_reviews.text: I liked that it was unscented and it did stop odor, but it irritated my arm pits so I had to discontinue using it. I believe I followed the directions and didn't use too much, but I guess I'm allergic to something in it.
customer_reviews.author: uninsurable

customer_reviews.title: Actually smells like real patchouli
customer_reviews.text: This is my second stick of Sam’s patchouli deodorant, and I like it. Though it goes on thicker than most other deodorants, I don’t care become I’m used to natural deodorants. I was just happy to find a patchouli deodorant that actually smelled like real patchouli! So many others do not; they smell like anything but. I have no complaints about this product.
customer_reviews.author: DaDB

customer_reviews.title: DON’T BUY IT, IT WILL RUIN YOUR CLOTHES
customer_reviews.text: The deodorant smells great and at first I thought it was going to be a good choice, even though it was difficult to wash off in the shower. Last week I noticed when folding my clean laundry that there were dark areas in the armpits, and when I dropped off my dry cleaning I noticed the same...a yellowish stain in the pits of my white shirts. Today I threw the deodorant in the trash after I picked up my dry cleaning and the owner said “I tried everything those stains won’t come out”. Hundreds of dollars of clothing ruined from this deodorant.
customer_reviews.author: Evan M.

customer_reviews.title: Performs!
customer_reviews.text: Wanted to get away from run of the mill deodorants with Aluminum. Tried different "Natural" products but, like this one the best. I'm not a big sweater but do my share enough so at the end of the day, with other products, you can tell they have worn off. This product keeps me confident all day and the better part of the evening and without introducing unnecessary "chemicals" into my system. Would highly recommend you give it a try.
customer_reviews.author: WWJ

customer_reviews.title: It’s Deodorant, So It Doesn’t Stink
customer_reviews.text: I’ve used Dana’s English Leather for over 50 years, but, alas, it is no longer available even on the internet. So I’m trying Sam’s as a possible alternative. It seems to work okay. The “Leather” smell’s not too bad and neither is the fact that it’s aluminum-free. As far as it’s being “vegan” and “cruelty” free, I guess I’ll look at it like a bank account. Using Sam’s deodorant earns me credits, so I can buy more hamburgers and kick more cats. But like I said, I buy the stuff for deodorant, not for a balm to soothe my conscience.
customer_reviews.author: Sebuka68

customer_reviews.title: Finally!!!! A winner
customer_reviews.text: We LOVE this deodorant. I can’t even venture a guess as to how much $ I have spent trying to find a natural deodorant for my husband that actually works....but I will waste no more! Feels good, not sticky. He has the Sandalwood (lovely woody, rich, only slightly sweet, unisex scent) and the Ravine (fresh, clean, soft yet masculine scent) and they are both fantastic. I actually use the sandalwood one myself sometimes and love it. My only wish, is that the scents were just a bit stronger, for longevity. Otherwise, this is the best natural deodorant out there!
customer_reviews.author: Kate

customer_reviews.title: Good product, but.....
customer_reviews.text: Here's the thing. I think this product is good, but the scent I chose was rather disagreeable. I purchased "Cedar" and it isn't what I expected. I live in the Pacific Northwest, and so I know a thing or two about timber. I was expecting the scent you smell when the needles are crushed. This isn't that scent. I feel the manufacturer would benefit if they offered a sampler wherein the customer could know what they are buying.
customer_reviews.author: Casey

customer_reviews.title: Keep looking 💯
customer_reviews.text: Meh, it's just like any other all natural deodorant(s). Pricey, feels like sand, doesn't last, and no real innovation on improving. " Solve these problems; affordable (I get it. Natural ingredients are expensive but how can it be more expensive than aluminum and other dyes, phosphorus chemicals, that's stuff in a lab, really?) use natural oils eucalyptus or lavender for body absorption."
customer_reviews.author: J I JOHN

customer_reviews.title: Best Natural Deodorant Out
customer_reviews.text: I have tried 5-10 different natural deodorants out there over the past 2 years and I am SOOO glad I found this. It's a product that really works. I have paid $15 for stuff that didn't work at all like they claimed. If you are looking for a great natural deodorant that really does work. This is it here. If your active, swat a decent amount during the day like I do. Than look no further
customer_reviews.author: Justin Brady

customer_reviews.title: I like it because it works for me!
customer_reviews.text: I like this natural deodorant because it works for me. I love the ingredients- it's nice to be able to pronounce every ingredient and know what it is. I'm 30 now and have become health conscious about what I put on and in my body. Aluminum is killing us folks, get away from it. Sure I sweat more now but thats natural. After I switched to Sam's my armpits slowly detoxed over about a week. Now when I sweat it barely has a smell! Crazy huh? All that body odor that I thought was me wasn't. It was from clogging up my pits with antiperspirants! Wilderness is my favorite scent. It literally smells like the Adirondacks!
customer_reviews.author: Jacob Frayer

customer_reviews.title: Smells like smoking a cigar in heaven. Fantastic.
customer_reviews.text: I was looking for a more natural alternative to the major brand deodorants. I came upon this one and love it. The smell is fantastic. Reminds me of a cigar box. It applies nicely and lasts all day. They recommend with any natural deodorant you do a cleanse to purge the old deodorant from your pores. I went 4 days without deodorant before I started applying this. Seem to do the trick. Natural is always better. Give it a try.
customer_reviews.author: stephen c schwochow

customer_reviews.title: Best Natural, Works well, Good Scent
customer_reviews.text: I tried other natural deodorants and either they didn't work or they caused issues like excess sweating (not during a brief adjustment period some mention, but always). This one is great by comparison, they got the formula just right to eliminate the issues and last long. Plus, the applicator is rounded which makes it more comfortable to apply than the oblong applicators. I highly recommend without reservation.
customer_reviews.author: R. Morris

customer_reviews.title: Best natural deo without aluminum, period.
customer_reviews.text: This is the only natural deodorant without aluminum (potassium alum) that works. I have used natural deodorant for years but just realized my usual “natural” deodorant has potassium alum as a main ingredient. Being a chronic lyme patient makes me more susceptible to metal toxicity and my recent HTMA shows aluminum being excreted at a high rate (which could be responsible for my tremors and seizure like episodes)Im grateful for this product because its the only natty deo that actually works.
customer_reviews.author: Erik F

customer_reviews.title: Oh man I wish I believed the one star reviews before I purchased
customer_reviews.text: To start this stuff smells really great. It went on easy enough. However a few days in and I was in so much pain. I kept using it for almost a full month when I just couldn't take it anymore. Before I started using this I washed up with bar soap and some shampoo just in case I had old residual deodorant. Nothing could have prepared me for how freaking painful it was after a week. I'm sure this works well for some but it was just horrible for me.
customer_reviews.author: Gummiebearkiller

customer_reviews.title: It really works, most of the time
customer_reviews.text: My wife and I really like this deodorant. This is the second one we tried. They both smell really good. We have done sandalwood and the one made for woman. If it is really hot then I will still get stinky but we live in a mild climate, so that does not happen too much. I have tried a lot of different natural deodorants and super excited to find one that works most of the time!
customer_reviews.author: Kerri Anne

customer_reviews.title: THIS WORKS!
customer_reviews.text: i've waited to write this review. but after two months, i can honestly celebrate the news that this is, indeed, a working wonder. with multiple sensitivities to other deodorants i have tried brand after brand of organic this and that. none of them offered any deodorant protection when used and several caused severe reactions. DEO is a jewel. organic, odorless (or almost) and, most importantly, it WORKS.
customer_reviews.author: fawnskin mudpuppy

customer_reviews.title: Solid and Scentworthy!
customer_reviews.text: I like the company and I think the folks comprising it make a good product. This deodorant seems a tad waxy while it's going on – but I mean that in a positive way: it feels substantive. It feels like it's no-nonsense, and I like the scent, too. Though this one was a kind of gift (hint hint??!!!), I'll probably be buying one for myself not too long a time from now....
customer_reviews.author: The Green Phantasm

customer_reviews.title: Adequate -- no BO with this DEO
customer_reviews.text: Non-offensive scent and didn't get a rash. Jury is still partially out, as I have not yet tried this in summertime. However, overall, I am pleased with this product. No B.O. while wearing this DEO, unlike many other natural deodorants I've tried. Bit pricey, but worth it to not smell putrid, and to avoid harmful chemicals. Anti-perspirant, it is not... but does an adequate job under normal conditions to prevent unpleasant odor. I'm satisfied, thus far.
customer_reviews.author: KN

customer_reviews.title: Stinkfest be gone!
customer_reviews.text: Im hooked...Wont use any other deodorant. Works soooo well! It will stain if you wear it heavy. Use a smaller amount for a light colored delicate shirt or blouse and rub in with your hand. I run around in a high stress situation at work and it works great for stress sweat! I wear dark scrubs so not worried about discoloration in the pit area.
customer_reviews.author: NurseDee

customer_reviews.title: Leaves a bad rash
customer_reviews.text: After one use I found myself dealing with a severe painful rash under both armpits. My skin had become completely dried out with raised bumps. I could not use deodorant of any kind for almost a week. Instead I had to keep applying neosporin until the rash turned into big clumps of dead skin falling off. I bought thinking this was one of those deodorants that also came in a cardboard plastic free container to make it more eco-friendly. I was wrong. It's in plastic.
customer_reviews.author: L. Fuller

customer_reviews.title: Love it! Didn't wear off all day!
customer_reviews.text: I've tried most of the name brand natural deodorants and I find that they mix with my body odor to create weird smells halfway through a workout or a work day. Sam's doesn't do this at all! It's not oily and gelly like most sticks so it doesn't seem to rub off as easily. I've put it to the test with days of dog walking then working out then manual labor at work then driving home on a hot summer day - I still smelled fresh at the end for dinner! FYI... I'm a female and I find the original scent a nice blend of softness and nature that doesn't smell too manly or too feminine.
customer_reviews.author: Kasey

customer_reviews.title: A great natural deodorant
customer_reviews.text: I have been using Sams natural deodorant for almost a year. I had tried quite a few before Sams and was never satisfied. Of course as it’s known it will take your body a couple of weeks to adjust to a natural deodorant , as was the case with myself . after the adjustment period I have to say I love Sams I find it has worked great for me and I have never expierenced myself smelling which I have experienced with every other natural deodorant I had tried. Keep up the good work!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Natural but some are abrasive to sensitive skin.
customer_reviews.text: So I've bought 3 different kind, sandalwood, wilderness, and 1 other I don't recall. Great natural deodorant, works for me and no offensive oder. Do not buy for a nice fregrance, they don't smell like the label. BIG warning if you have sensitive skin, Wilderness is grainy and abrasive! Sandalwood isn't as bad but is a bit rough, stay clear of the griany ones if you value your underarms.
customer_reviews.author: Aaron

customer_reviews.title: The best deodorant I’ve ever used
customer_reviews.text: The best deodorant I’ve ever used. I’ve used Sam is natural for about three years now. I still don’t understand how something natural can last so long! I bike ride a lot and I can go 24 hours without smelling! LOL the stuff is pretty amazing I’ve used Sam’s natural for about three years now. I still don’t understand how something natural can last so long! I bike ride a lot and I can go 24 hours without smelling! LOL the stuff is pretty amazing The best part about it? I don’t my undershirts have yellow stains any more on the armpits.
customer_reviews.author: the chef

customer_reviews.title: Causes bad irritation.
customer_reviews.text: This product will clog your pores, stain your clothes and break your armpits out. I used one stick and it worked great couple days into the second stick it turned my armpits red feeling really itchy and burning at the same time. It’s been over a week I haven’t used any deodorant and my arms are still tired up. Unfortunately the second time I bought them was by the 2 and I didn’t return it in time and now I have 1 full brand new stick still in the bubble rap I have no use for.
customer_reviews.author: zackary Taylor long

customer_reviews.title: Best natural deodorant product I've ever used. (and I've tried several)
customer_reviews.text: This is the best natural deodorant I've ever used. Number 1: It actually works. The scent is a mild cedar. It doesn't take a lot, I mean you don't have to rubba dub dub. Stroke it slowly so that it softens as you apply it to your skin. In the rare times I had to go a day or so without showering, it continued to work well controlling my BO. The downside is at the end of the stick there is a lot of product left inside the cup that you can't access. I highly recommend this deodorant if you're looking for a good natural ingredient product.
customer_reviews.author: B. Powers

customer_reviews.title: I simply love the Sandalwood !
customer_reviews.text: This is the best product I have ever tried in my life. It is natural, long lasting, effective in keeping me dry and smelling good! It is all natural and that I like the best. It last a long time. Five swipes under the arm and I am done. I tried another natural product, which although it had a nice scent did not last and I wasted the product for it was too soft. Your product outshines commercial non organic products. I use to use Old Spice, but will never go back. I will stick with yours. A+
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Smells great, but that's about it.
customer_reviews.text: Luckily this product didn't irritate my skin, but it also didn't work as an antiperspirant- my pits were swimming in sweat within 30 minutes of working outside. It smells wonderful though, I bought this deodorant because oakmoss scented products are harder to find.
customer_reviews.author: Outdoorsy

customer_reviews.title: This stuff works!
customer_reviews.text: I react to a lot of deodorant products. ESPECIALLY the anti-antiperspirants! I tried this stuff even though the price is higher than a regular deo. But this product performs so much better than any other deodorant I have used, now I'm hooked! Non-standard scents are offered, but any I have tried are not strong, so no "over-scent" even when perspiring. This stuff just works for me which is a super find!!
customer_reviews.author: VideoAddict

customer_reviews.title: Will be buying more !
customer_reviews.text: First off, i do use other natural deoderants. my issue was that i work outside and the other deodorants ive tried would wear off very fast. this one, does not. this deodorant lasts me all day long with no issues. i have very sensitive skin and this doesn't bother me at all. another note is that its not a wet deodorant which is great. the only thing i would say is that i wish the smell was a little better, but its a natural deodorant, and this is the only scent ive tried. it is not an issue at all because it worrks great and smells good.
customer_reviews.author: Teejay Ryder

customer_reviews.title: One swipe is enough for all day protection
customer_reviews.text: Just a great long lasting deodorant. I typically purchase Method because it too lasts long for a natural deodorant, but Sam’s has really impressed me. It takes much less, strongly suggest a quick swipe, and it holds me through the work day and gym without the need to reapply. I am a heavy sweating fellow, just to qualify this review.
customer_reviews.author: Big Creek

customer_reviews.title: Bad rash reaction. Great smell.
customer_reviews.text: I don't care for the tobacco scent. It smells more like vaseline. The women's scent is great. The sandalwood scent is my favorite. Smells just like sandalwood. *******I have been using this brand for almost half a year now. I have formed a red, oval-shaped allergic reaction rash thingy. It has been here for quite awhile and I am no longer going to use this deodorant brand. I don't put much on and I'm very gentle. Still kills me. And it hurts as well. I would be careful if you have sensitive skin.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Excellent natural option
customer_reviews.text: This deodorant is excellent. A very little amount lasts a long time. It will even last two days (of light activity) if you don’t shower it off. There is a smell even though it’s unscented. The application is rough and will remove armpit hair at every application. Also, for those with sensitive skin, you might react to this. I get irritation after several uses. Overall, I recommend this product.
customer_reviews.author: Patrick M

customer_reviews.title: This is a Healthy Alternative
customer_reviews.text: I have been using this product for some time now and am impressed with the consistency of this product. It offers long lasting protection keeping me dry all day long. If one heads the recommended applications you can avoid any heavy build up some have referred to in their reviews. When transitioning to this product from traditional commercial products the tendency is to over use. A little goes a long way. Not needed with this product. Its a great product with out all the nasty phthalates, parabens, sulfates, or dye.
customer_reviews.author: Don

customer_reviews.title: lightly and got a painful rash (I’ve used other natural deodorants and gotten slight ...
customer_reviews.text: Very strong fragerance. Used once, lightly and got a painful rash (I’ve used other natural deodorants and gotten slight rash but goes away). I can’t use this.
customer_reviews.author: JDonner

customer_reviews.title: Good stuff
customer_reviews.text: I've been using this deodorant for about 3 months now. I had tried another natural aluminum-free deodorant before this one and it made my underarms break out in a mean, painful, itchy rash so I was hesitant when trying this one. So far it's been working great and has just enough sandalwood sent to make it smell nice but not be overpowering. It's vegan, all natural, doesn't stain my shirts, it's everything I'm looking for. Will definitely order again.
customer_reviews.author: That Guy

customer_reviews.title: Give this stuff a try if you really want a deodorant that works
customer_reviews.text: I don't leave reviews very often. I own a carpet cleaning company. We clean a bunch of AMC Theaters and Restaurants. I sweat like crazy. I work 6-10 hours non stop every night except Sunday. This is the best deodorant I have come across. When they say a little goes along way. They are not kidding. Too much and it will leave a rash. I was using Degree and Dove stain guard. Those products are a joke. They left a white residue on my black shirts. This stuff does not leave.any marks and I really stay dry amd odor free
customer_reviews.author: James Kelly

customer_reviews.title: Disappointing Rash
customer_reviews.text: I love the effectiveness and subtle scent of this deodorant, but even with one gentle swipe I get a nasty red rash. This has happened to me with other natural deodorants, so I must be reactive to some common ingredient in them. I notice a few others have the same problem. Disappointing because otherwise I love it.
customer_reviews.author: Keith Mcmullen

customer_reviews.title: Lasts awhile even when working in the sun
customer_reviews.text: I had given up wearing deodorant about a year ago. Not a problem since I live on a farm. A friend recommended that I try this product and I am loving it. I do not have to shower twice a day and the unscented does not have any fake or fragrant smell to it. I can be out on my tractor for several hours in the sun and still smell like a daisy.
customer_reviews.author: Occy Joe

customer_reviews.title: best working deodorant I have ever used
customer_reviews.text: I don't sweat a ton but I am extremely active and after a long run the deodorant is still working great even after more than 24 hours...the others claim to be 24 hours, but I have never found that to really be the case...this stuff is amazing...the only downside is that you need to get used to it in the beginning...what I mean by that is Sam's is pure...and its a dry rub on...no moisturizer...to gel, etc...so it can irritate the skin a bit...even if you don't put much on...but after a few weeks its not noticeable anymore...that is the only reason why I don't give it 5 stars...otherwise great stuff.
customer_reviews.author: pclay

customer_reviews.title: Unsafe, causes rash
customer_reviews.text: I didn’t want to believe the other reviews about rashes. Gave me a weird red rash under both arms after a couple of weeks. I only apply two swipes and don’t use it every day but it still happened. This product is unsafe which is a shame since it smells good.
customer_reviews.author: Edmund Morel

customer_reviews.title: Make the change !
customer_reviews.text: Love this deodorant ! I used to not care what deodorant I wore but after having minor issues with the more popular ones ( Gillette , Speed Stick ) I decided to try something more natural . I will never turn back ! At first it takes some getting used to as your body isn’t not accustomed to the deodorant but you’ll quickly get used to it . I can’t find it in regular stores which sucks but I’m happy to keep buying it off of here . It easily maskes my ordor for the entire day .
customer_reviews.author: brandon

customer_reviews.title: This works wonderfully.
customer_reviews.text: After using Native for a year and having breakthrough odor every day, I was ready for a change. I switched to natural deodorants after a diagnosis of dementia. Thankfully, that proved to not be the case but still wanted fewer chemicals in my hygiene products. To say I am more than pleased with this product is an understatement. I have zero odor!!! I highly recommend this.
customer_reviews.author: Tina

customer_reviews.title: Scent is very spicy.
customer_reviews.text: The scent is very "spicy". Almost like too much patchouli. I was looking for more or a citrusy Bay Rum. This could have just been lack of research on my part with the product. Performs alright however. I feel like it does hold back the sweat odors. It's just that the scent is very strong and very spicy. Kind of like sticking your nose in a bowl of potpourri
customer_reviews.author: Jaron

customer_reviews.title: Leaves a dark yellow stain on tee shirts.
customer_reviews.text: Goes on very greasy. You feel very greasy and oily under your pits whole day not a nice feeling at all. The worst part is that it leaves a disgusting yellow stain on all my teeshirts under the pit area. The stains are so deep in colour they refuse to wash out by heavy washing even with hand washing and soaking for long hours. I will have to throw away my under teeshirts and get new ones because they are stained badly. Will be throwing away this deodorant and not be buying again.
customer_reviews.author: RAD

customer_reviews.title: Works great!
customer_reviews.text: This deodorant works great for me. I am very active and have a physical job. It Keeps me dry and odor free more than any other deodorant, natural or not (I don't use aluminium based anti-perspirants). It is yet to be seen how well it works in the dead of the sunmer, but I have high hopes. Update: Works great in the heat! Love this product, bought a different scent to try. Only downside is that if I over apply it will cause me to perspire for a short time until everything balances out again. That is an issue with all natural antiperspirants tho.
customer_reviews.author: A-zon customer

customer_reviews.title: Excellent product but yanks armpit hair.
customer_reviews.text: I really, really like this deodorant. The scent is fantastic and the ingredients are long-lasting and effective. There is a catch, however. It does not glide on as smoothly as deodorants you are probably used to. It about ripped my armpit hair right out the first couple times I used it. I've been using it for about a week now and it seems to get better or at least the nerve-ending in my pits don't care as much. It takes a little time getting used to but I really do like the product.
customer_reviews.author: Keith Cardon

customer_reviews.title: Really works well!
customer_reviews.text: What I like the most? This deoderant works better than anything else I have every used!! What I like least? Well, maybe I put too much on or something but it is strong stuff and can make my armpits itchy. Not red and irritated, just itchy. Must be the bay oil. But wow, it really works well. I gave it 4 stars because of the irritation but... really it is a 5 star product if it doesn't bother you.
customer_reviews.author: Michael S. Jessop

customer_reviews.title: READ REVIEWS
customer_reviews.text: I had high hopes for this product. I’m always looking for deodorant products not full of horrible ingredients, and ultimately ones that don’t trash the under arms of my shirts. Unfortunately I didn’t get that far with product. After my first application I had some burning/tingling under my arm. I chose to ignore it, by the end of the day I could feel something under my arm, by nighttime I already had a raw looking rash. I considered giving it one more day but decided it wasn’t worth the risk of the rawness getting worse. Unfortunately I had to throw it away.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Not for sensitive skin
customer_reviews.text: I try not to be too negative, as my partner used this product with no issues. However I have pretty sensitive skin and as soon as I started to sweat, my armpits would burn. I tried on three separate occasions, with three different activities before determining it was the deodorant. Again, worked great for my partner and smells pretty good too. Just not the best for sensitive skin.
customer_reviews.author: Aphelion

customer_reviews.title: All natural and it really works
customer_reviews.text: I've been using this product for about 2 months now. I can honestly say this product is great. The fragrance lasts a long time. You don't need much of the product for it to work as well. The best part? It's all natural. I did notice a rash at first, but I started applying less of it which was still more than enough and that helped.
customer_reviews.author: Rory Riqueno

customer_reviews.title: Loved the scent of it, but...
customer_reviews.text: After using this product for a couple of weeks, I found that it was building up with a kind of oily waxy texture that would not wash off of my skin. Then it totally stopped "working" for me. I ended up scrubbing with baking soda to get it off. Then I had to go back to my old mass-market brand.
customer_reviews.author: Gretchen

customer_reviews.title: NOT WHAT I WANTED
customer_reviews.text: I was looking for unscented deodorants and mistakenly took this one listed towards the bottom. Bad decision on my part. I don't like scented deodorants, and I find Tea Tree as repulsive as any I've ever smelled. But if you like the Tea Tree scent, you might love this deodorant.
customer_reviews.author: SetterSpeaker

customer_reviews.title: Reccomends
customer_reviews.text: Have so often thought about the chemicals in things but they worked. Then this I found....holy dry spell this stuff works. Even ordered some for my granddaughter ( ladies type of course) Still I'm sure even this will be listed as dangerous sometime. Until then....I'm a user, addicted, it works
customer_reviews.author: J. H. Lewis

customer_reviews.title: Effective and no irritation
customer_reviews.text: Disclaimer: I haven't had the product long and only used it a couple times (I have a few other natural deodorants that I use as well, and change scents to coordinate with my bodywash/perfume for the day). The times I have used this though, I had no irritation from it despite using about 4-6 swipes, and the scent was light but pleasant and effective. I didn't notice any funky odors at the end of the day, and I live in the South, so it definitely was put through its paces.
customer_reviews.author: Carrie

customer_reviews.title: Could cause hives
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this after researching for natural deodorant because another brand that's was using for a couple of year and was nationally televised stopped working and made my pits smell horrible no matter how many times I applied the product. Sam's smells good, keeps the odor away, but I'm having problems with hives and breakouts under one armpit! I'm not sure I can continue to use this product. I'm giving it some time to see if my body adjusts.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Spot On
customer_reviews.text: The smell of this deodorant is spot on to how leather smells and doesn't turn different throughout the day. The first time I used this deodorant a co-worker of mine noticed and I said it was a leather cologne. No adverse reactions to its use. A bigger stick would get 5 stars.
customer_reviews.author: Gj

customer_reviews.title: Like that it is aluminum free and cruelty free - thank you for that.
customer_reviews.text: I so much wanted to like this product. For me the scent was quite off putting. Thought that if I liked it I would try the coconut scented one next. Unfortunately application of this product was very uncomfortable - it felt as if my skin was going to tear. Maybe I have extra sensitive skin but I don’t think so.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Beware of irritation
customer_reviews.text: I'm a very active individual. I apply deodorant after a shower and before working out. After 2 weeks I noticed that my skin was beginning to turn red and irritated, my armpits were always drenched in sweat, and the smell was getting worse everyday. This deodorant did not mix well with my chemical make up and stopped working at this point in time. I would not purchase again.
customer_reviews.author: Javier

customer_reviews.title: Finally a deodorant that really works!!
customer_reviews.text: After decades of trying to be satisfied with marginally effective deodorants that worked as long as you didn't sweat, I took the advice of my son who discovered this deodorant. I cannot believe how well it works. I am partial to patchouli. The scent is not overpowering but very pleasant. I am willing to pay a bit more for this because it works
customer_reviews.author: Marc G. Meininger

customer_reviews.title: a little goes a long way
customer_reviews.text: I really love this deodorant! You can tell that they use actual Vetiver essential oil. It doesnt give me a rash and I have pretty sensitive skin. I have a very active lifestyle, and this stuff holds up to all my daily activities. I have tried many other natural deodorants including lume and this one is my favorite so far.
customer_reviews.author: Naomi

customer_reviews.title: Simply Amazing!!!
customer_reviews.text: I rarely write reviews only if the product is exceptional or if It’s terrible and I want to warn others not to waste money. This product has blown me away! I have tried other natural deodorants, and still have to reapply or find myself still having some odor at the end of the day. Not this one!!! It really works! I live in south Louisiana where heat and humidity=sweat April thru November. I volunteered at my son’s school @ an outdoor field day the first week of getting it in 90+ degree temperatures sweating all day, and no hint of odor! Amazing stuff! (I bought the Women’s option). Well done Sam’s!!!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Patchouli
customer_reviews.text: Unfortunately this just doesn't smell much like patchouli. it's vaguely patchouli-ish, but it smells more like dried thyme (the herb) or old grass clippings and gardening soil than anything else. I'll use it until it's gone, because it doesn't have aluminum and I bought an entire container.... I guess if it ends up working really well or redeeming itself in some way I'll edit this review. If unedited, it didn't redeem itself.
customer_reviews.author: kat

customer_reviews.title: Works great but doesn't smell great
customer_reviews.text: I use this brand pretty religiously and it works great. Only knock is this scent isn't to great.
customer_reviews.author: vlade86

customer_reviews.title: ReD directions
customer_reviews.text: Great product! Ppl wo ad bad reviews were not following directions a little goes along way!the lady with stains applied too much! I m not a freak. By any means but did stain a white t shirt. Now after reading the directions no problems good shit
customer_reviews.author: Larry

customer_reviews.title: Horrible rash
customer_reviews.text: Yeah, it's too late for me to get a refund but this stuff REALLY burned up my underarms and I still have a lot left. I can't use it anymore and sparingly used it because it would case a rash and now my skin looks and feels burned, so I'm done.
customer_reviews.author: Leslie

customer_reviews.title: Best natural deodorant out there!!
customer_reviews.text: Love love love this!!! Definitely worth buying. I’m a woman and use the unscentrd and I sweat a lot. This stuff is so much better than Schmidt’s Deodorant. I used theirs for over a year before finding this one. I also tried Primal Paste, which is a waste of money because it didn’t spread at all.
customer_reviews.author: J. W.

customer_reviews.title: Goodbye dove
customer_reviews.text: I sweat a lot at work and had used many different deodorants. I recently looked into more natural deodorants and stumbled on Sam's. I am now on my 3rd stick of bay scent and this stuff is phenomenal. I used to get extreme irritation when I would fall asleep without showering with dove. I have never had an issue wearing this. It may seem a bit pricey but the stick lasts so long. Absolutely a must try.
customer_reviews.author: cfitz

customer_reviews.title: Awesome
customer_reviews.text: It has a tobacco scent, but not a smoker's scent (if that makes sense). Its not overpowering. I have sensitive skin but this hasn't caused issue nor has it stained clothing. Ive worn it casually and while working out. I plan to buy more.
customer_reviews.author: Texas Outlaw13

product_meta.title: Sam’s Natural Deodorant - Aluminum Free - No phthalates, parabens, sulfates, or dyes - Made in New Hampshire - Women, Unisex - Vegan, Cruelty Free - 3 oz - Women's
feature_bullets: AVAILABLE IN 17 AWESOME SCENTS – We offer a variety of distinctive and intriguing scents for every personality or occasion. WOMEN'S is gently scented with a lavender and sage blend. Scented with Essential Oil.

LONG LASTING AND HARDWORKING –Don’t trust your personal hygiene to just anyone. We have been crafting Sam’s Natural Deodorant since 2011 in the foothills of New Hampshire’s White Mountains. People LOVE our deodorants because they work naturally to leave you smelling fresh all day long!

HOW TO APPLY – A little bit goes a long way! Resist the urge to over apply, 1-2 light swipes is all you need. Over application is a common mistake which may cause a minor rash. If this occurs, we recommend reducing the application amount or discontinuing use. A small percentage of people may simply be sensitive to the ingredients in our product and unable to wear any amount; the most common being baking soda.

FREE FROM HARSH CHEMICALS & ECO-FRIENDLY – Our unique formula is incredibly effective against odors, without the use of harsh chemicals. Our natural deodorants are free of aluminum, parabens, phthalates and propylene-glycol. We are also proud to be Certified Vegan and Cruelty-Free! And because we want to be as gentle on the earth as we are to your underarms, our deodorant is packaged in 100% recyclable plastic tubes.

FIRST CLASS SERVICE – Not only do we make excellent, hardworking natural products but our customer service is hardworking too! If you are dissatisfied for any reason, we offer hassle-free returns with a full refund within 30 days from date of purchase. Our knowledgeable customer service team loves to answer questions about our products and you can be assured you will find ordering from us an easy and pleasurable experience.
